page.shortlink: api client api a5 panellayout expandflow method

argument.name: expandAll
argument.description: Whether or not to expand all panels, or just to expand to the next collapsed panel (if A5.PanelLayout.collapseFlow was called multiple times). The default value is false.

argument.name: animation
argument.description: Whether or not to animate the panel layout transition. The default value is true.

page.description: Activate a child panel of the layout.
page.example: // assume pObj is a pointer to a panel class pObj.expandFlow(true); // expand all collaped panels
